name: The Cat & The Pig
description:
The Cat and the Pig

Top down platformer for GMTK Game Jam 2020, theme: 'Out of Control'

You control the cat, who controls the pig. The pig isn't great at listening to commands though, and often confuses the cats signals. Move and jump your way through 8 levels to get to the end, and sweet freedom for the cat and the pig.

Controls update each screen and will be shown on screen. Press 'r' at any time to restart the screen. Press 'Esc' to return to the menu.
